SEARCH
Package uk.msci.project.rsa

Class GenRSA

java.lang.Object
uk.msci.project.rsa.GenRSA
public class GenRSA extends Object
The GenRSA class is responsible for generating RSA key pairs. It allows for the creation of keys with a modulus derived from multiple distinct prime numbers, offering flexibility in terms of the number and size of these primes.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    GenRSA(int k, int[] lambda)
    Constructs a GenRSA object that can generate RSA keys with a modulus derived from k distinct primes with specified bit lengths.

  • Constructor Details

    • GenRSA

      public GenRSA(int k, int[] lambda) throws IllegalArgumentException
      Constructs a GenRSA object that can generate RSA keys with a modulus derived from k distinct primes with specified bit lengths.
      Parameters:
      k - The number of distinct primes to be generated.
      lambda - An array of integers representing the bit lengths of each prime number.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - If the lambda array does not have k elements or if the sum of bit lengths does not meet the key size requirements.

  • Method Details

    • generatePrimeComponents

      public BigInteger[] generatePrimeComponents()
      Generates an array of k distinct prime numbers based on the provided bit lengths.
      Returns:
      An array of BigInteger representing the distinct prime numbers.

    • computePhi

      public BigInteger computePhi(BigInteger[] components)
      Computes the Euler's totient function (φ) for an RSA modulus that is the product of k distinct prime numbers.
      Parameters:
      components - An array of BigInteger representing the distinct prime numbers.
      Returns:
      The result of the Euler's totient function.

    • computeE

      public BigInteger computeE(BigInteger phi)
      Computes the public exponent e for public key component in the RSA Key pair.
      Parameters:
      phi - The result of Euler's totient function.
      Returns:
      The public exponent e.

    • genModulus

      public BigInteger genModulus(BigInteger[] primes)
      Generates the RSA modulus by multiplying a given array of prime numbers.
      Parameters:
      primes - An array of BigInteger prime numbers.
      Returns:
      The RSA modulus as a BigInteger, resulting from the product of the prime numbers.

    • generateKeyPair

      public KeyPair generateKeyPair()
      Generates the RSA key pair.
      Returns:
      A KeyPair object containing the generated RSA public and private keys.

    • getKeySize

      public int getKeySize()
      Returns the size of the key to be generated.
      Returns:
      The bit length of the RSA keys.

    • getCertainty

      public int getCertainty()
      Returns the certainty level used for prime number generation. The higher the certainty, the more certain it is that the generated numbers are prime.
      Returns:
      The certainty level for prime number generation.
